name: DeskRoll Remote Desktop
tag_list: remote-desktop, helpdesk, remote-support, remote-access, unattended-access, remote-administration, remote-help, remote-connection, vnc, remote-control, screen-sharing, desktop-sharing, desktop-streaming, remote-assistance, collaboration-tools
overview:
DeskRoll is a web-based remote desktop tool. It’s tailored for individuals and small companies that need a simple solution for:

  • remote support of their clients;
  • remote access to some unattended machines.

For the Technician who does the remote access, DeskRoll works on any platform with a modern browser. This includes mobile devices. On the remote computer you have to start a small app.

DeskRoll includes the necessary contact management and reporting features for SOHO and small enterprises.

DeskRoll was developed with a strong access on ease of use and consistent user experience on all supported platforms.
